short_description: accella digital is a digital & marketing agency based in sofia, bulgaria.
long_description: accella digital is a digital agency focused on performance marketing. we manage result driven digital channels while planning and optimizing your advertising expenses to achieve optimal results. our work is based on the data we collect and the usage of automation tools. as a google certified premier partner, we work at proficient levels with all google portfolio products and other performance platforms. we set up tracking pixels, build a customised digital strategy for collecting campaign performance information and create kpis to track in real-time. we use a variety of reporting and performance tools across all ad platforms, combined with google analytics's capabilities to analyse collected information. we always take data-driven decisions based on analysis of collected information, which should be statistically significant and measurable both in advertising platforms and google analytics. accella digital is digital performance agency providing ppc, seo and conversion rate optimization.
generated_description: accella digital, legally known as ansara media ltd., is a digital performance marketing agency based in sofia, bulgaria. the company specializes in performance marketing, offering services such as ppc (pay-per-click) advertising, seo (search engine optimization), conversion rate optimization, and digital marketing training. as a certified google premier partner, accella digital works proficiently with all google portfolio products and other performance platforms. the agency is known for its data-driven approach, leveraging automation tools and google analytics to achieve optimal results for its clients. accella digital has received multiple awards, including finalist status in the display innovation category for google premier partner awards in 2018 and 2019.
